title: Designing Behavioral Engagement for Online Science Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals (medical/legal/technical) with intermediate domain expertise, conducting self-directed learning in an asynchronous LMS environment.

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete online science inquiry activity modules with an 80%+ completion rate
Learners demonstrate spontaneous information-seeking behavior at least three times during inquiry-based tasks
Learners generate at least one collaborative problem-solving case through asynchronous peer interactions

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
